title: Deep Unfolding-Based Linear Inverse Problem Signal Recovery: Utilizing Multimodal Data

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: For corporate data processing managers, focuses on acquiring efficient signal restoration techniques with limited computing resources, with case-centered education for language processing domain applications

learning_goals: Explain the structure of the deep unfolding model and its application mechanism for linear inverse problems
Learners can implement and evaluate the performance of signal reconstruction algorithms using multimodal data.
Learners can demonstrate computational efficiency by applying the model to real-world language processing scenarios (e.g., RGB-infrared image restoration).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
